Author: bluecokezero
Text: Give it time. Seriously. Your body will even out and know how much it needs to eat. Your system has been out of whack for however long you’ve been disordered, it also needs time to recover and figure out what works best again. I’d say give it about two months (it won’t be two months of straight binging- I promise) and if you still feel like your eating is out of whack then I’d talk to a professional. Unless you’re already doing that, which in that case great !

Author: Skiinky
Text: Eat what you need to eat, don't purge, things will settle down
